introduction: Suryaputra Karn is an ongoing Indian mythological television series, which premiered on 29 June 2015 on Sony Entertainment Television (India) and Sony Entertainment Television Asia. The show is slated to air on Monday through Thursday nights. The series is created and produced by Siddharth Kumar Tewary of Swastik Pictures. The show will cover life journey of the Great Archer of Indian History Karna. The promo of the series has already been telecast on the respective channel.[1][2]Karanvir Bohra, Karan Grover and Karan Tacker will be in lead roles. Besides the three Karans, there are chances that Avinesh Rekhi will also be signed for the series.[3] Mouli Ganguly will be playing the role of Radha, Karna's foster mother.[4]The channel aired the series first on Multi Screen's app Sony LIV, before airing on its main channel.[5]
